original_text: It is true that some of these Christians are jealous of me. They want to show that they are better than me. That is why they tell people the message about Christ. But other Christians speak about Christ because they want to help me.
korean_text: 어떤 이들은 투기와 분쟁으로, 어떤 이들은 착한 뜻으로 그리스도를 전파하나니

sentences.original_text: that some of these Christians are jealous of me
sentences.korean_translation: 이 기독교인 중 일부가 나를 질투합니다

sentences.original_text: that they are better than me
they tell people the message about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 사람들에게 그리스도에 대한 메시지를 전하는 이유

sentences.original_text: But other Christians speak about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 기독교인들은 그리스도에 대해 말합니다

sentences.original_text: because they want to help me
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 나를 돕고 싶어하기 때문입니다
